title: Randomization Times under Quantum Chaotic Hamiltonian Evolution
summary: Randomness generation through quantum-chaotic evolution underpins foundational questions in statistical mechanics and applications across quantum information science, including benchmarking, tomography, metrology, and demonstrations of quantum computational advantage.
